  <script>
   (function() {
        var frame = window;
        var cmpFrame;
        var cmpCallbacks = {};
        while (frame) {
            try {
                if (frame.frames['__tcfapiLocator']) {
                    cmpFrame = frame;
                    break;
                }
            } catch (ignore) {}
            if (frame === window.top) {
                break;
            }
            frame = frame.parent;
        }

        function postMessageHandler(event) {
            var msgIsString = typeof event.data === 'string';
            var json = {};

            try {
                if (msgIsString) {
                    json = JSON.parse(event.data);
                } else {
                    json = event.data;
                }
            } catch (ignore) {}

            var payload = json.__tcfapiCall;

            if (payload) {
                window.__tcfapi(
                    payload.command,
                    payload.version,

                    function(retValue, success) {
                        var returnMsg = {
                            __tcfapiReturn: {
                                returnValue: retValue,
                                success: success,
                                callId: payload.callId
                            }
                        };
                        if (msgIsString) {
                            returnMsg = JSON.stringify(returnMsg);
                        }
                        event.source.postMessage(returnMsg, '*');
                    },
                    payload.parameter
                );
            }
        }
        window.addEventListener('message', postMessageHandler, false);
    }());
  </script>

                AdviewAdsTag.kwTargeting.push('testyab_'+gExVariation);

                googletag.pubads().setTargeting('test', [''+ gazeta_pl.abTestsGroup ]);
                AdviewAdsTag.DFPTargeting.push('test|'+gazeta_pl.abTestsGroup);

            googletag.pubads().setTargeting('cb', [''+window.AG.rodoAccepted]);

            googletag.pubads().setTargeting('contentCategories', window.contentCategories || []);

            googletag.pubads().setTargeting('domena', 'www.gazeta.pl');

                AdviewAdsTag.slotRenderEnded(event)

  <script>
   googletag.cmd.push(function () {
        googletag.pubads().setTargeting('miasto', 'Pozostale');

  </script>
  <script>
   var gazeta_pl = gazeta_pl || {};
            gazeta_pl.listenerLoadedAds = (function () {
                var loadedAds = [];
                var premiumBoardParams = "";
                var partnerAds = [];
                function init () {
                    document.addEventListener('adviewDfpSlotRenderEnd', addAd);
                    document.addEventListener('adviewDfpPremiumBoard', setPremiumBoardProperties , { once: true });
                    document.addEventListener("insertedPartnerAd", getPartnerAds);
                }
                function addAd (adsProperties) {
                    if(adsProperties.detail){
                        loadedAds.push(adsProperties.detail);
                    }
                }
                function setPremiumBoardProperties (adsProperties) {
                    if(adsProperties.detail){
                        gazeta_pl.listenerLoadedAds.premiumBoardParams = adsProperties.detail;
                    }
                }
                function getPartnerAds(adsProperties) {
                    if (adsProperties.detail) {
                        partnerAds.push(adsProperties.detail)
                    }
                }
                return {
                    init: init,
                    premiumBoardParams: premiumBoardParams,
                    loadedAds: loadedAds,
                    partnerAds: partnerAds
                };
            })();
            gazeta_pl.listenerLoadedAds.init();
  </script>

      <a class="article article--redTitle article--MT" href="https://wiadomosci.gazeta.pl/wiadomosci/7,173952,26863357,nfz-zaleca-ograniczenie-do-minimum-zawieszenie-zabiegow-planowych.html#s=BoxOpMT" id="LinkArea:BoxOpMT" title="System trzeszczy.        <div class="article__image">
        <img alt="Zdjęcie do artykułu System trzeszczy. NFZ ogranicza do minimum lub zawiesza planowe zabiegi. Powodem COVID-19" data-src="https://bi.im-g.pl/im/2c/25/19/z26369068IC.jpg" src="https://static.im-g.pl/im/1/23865/m23865141,SAMPLE.png"/>
       </div>
       <header class="article__description">
        <div class="article__title">
         System trzeszczy. NFZ ogranicza do minimum lub zawiesza planowe zabiegi. Powodem COVID-19
        </div>
       </header>
      </a>

      </div>
      <!-- UZREditor -->
      <!-- htmEOF -->
     </div>
    </div>
   </section>
   <section class="c-section--opening_c2c grid--4-1 c-box">
    <h2 class="o-section--header">
     TO JEST MODNE
    </h2>
    <a href="https://avanti24.pl/Magazyn/7,150441,26861420,trendy-wiosna-lato-2021-koronka-podbija-swiatowe-wybiegi-podpowiadamy.html?utm_source=hp&amp;utm_medium=BOKSspecjalny#s=BoxSpImg1" id="LinkArea:BoxSpimg1" title="Totalna wyprzedaż koronkowych ubrań!      <h2>

   <section class="c-section--culture grid--4-1 c-box">
    <section class="o-section--header">
     <h2>
      <a name="o-section--culture" title="Cykle Gazeta.pl">
       Cykle Gazeta.pl
      </a>
     </h2>
     <ul class="o-tags">
      <li>
       <a href="https://weekend.gazeta.pl/weekend/0,164869.html#s=BoxCyklNavLink" id="LinkArea:BoxCyklNavLink" title="Młoda Polska">
        Młoda Polska
       </a>
      </li>
      <li>
       <a href="https://wiadomosci.gazeta.pl/wiadomosci/0,114916.html?tag=pi%B1tki+dla+klimatu#s=BoxCyklNavLink" id="LinkArea:BoxCyklNavLink" title="Piątki dla klimatu">
        Piątki dla klimatu
       </a>
      </li>
      <li>
       <a href="https://www.sport.pl/sport/0,105641.html?tag=wilkowicz+sam+na+sam#s=BoxCyklNavLink" id="LinkArea:BoxCyklNavLink" title="Wilkowicz Sam na sam">
        Wilkowicz Sam na Sam
       </a>
      </li>
      <li>
       <a href="https://weekend.gazeta.pl/weekend/0,168449.html#s=BoxCyklNavLink" id="LinkArea:BoxCyklNavLink" title="Zwykli-niezwykli">
        Zwykli-niezwykli
       </a>
      </li>
     </ul>
    </section>

        </div>

     <div class="offers__wrapper">
